DOC.brief_summary: Researchers USDA Western Human Nutrition Research Center clinicians UC Davis Medical Center currently conduct study effect vitamin D supplementation pregnancy maternal health immune function . The investigator believe vitamin D supplementation level great current recommendation beneficial maternal health pregnancy . In particular , evidence vitamin D deficiency pregnancy put woman great risk disease like pre-eclampsia , may due imbalance immune function placenta . This randomized , double-blind study design test hypothesis . Pregnant woman participate study receive either 400 IU 2,000 IU vitamin D per day duration pregnancy . The investigator collect blood three time point pregnancy ( 16-20 week , 26-28 week , 36 week gestation ) analysis immune function vitamin D status . The investigator also collect data clinical parameter , blood pressure glucose tolerance .
DOC.brief_title: Effects Vitamin D Supplementation During Pregnancy Clinical Outcomes Immune Function
